name: StellarDrive (prototype)
description:
Gather materials, build a space ship and explore procedural worlds. This is a game prototype with the following features:

  • Spaceship building system
  • Two fully procedural planets and a moon
  • Beautiful programmer art
  • Many bugs that I'm aware of and probably many more that I'm not

My goal is to create a seamless space survival game where it's just you, your spaceship, and an uncaring universe. If you're interested in following the game's progress, check out my social media:

  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/CuriousOwlDev
  • Discord: https://discord.gg/adA8nqqJ49
Requirements

The game uses your computer's GPU to procedurally generate terrain, textures & object placements. You should have at least 2-3 GB of VRAM

Installation

Download the zip file, extract and launch StellarDrive.exe
